name: Useless Machines Inc.
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 46: Keep it alive.

Use your mouse and be fast, or this little human will be the last.
Johnson Inc. must be the worst fantasy company ever, it's mission is kinda weird. To preserve species? who controls these machines? is it you? Okay.
The good part is I didn't have the time to do some complex puzzles to make things really complicated.

I will be working on post-jam version with some added stuff and a real title screen with settings.

Graphics: Photoshop
3Ds: Blender 8.1
Audio: Multiple Sources / FL Studio / Audacity
Powered by Godot Engine 3.2

PRESS Q TO CHANGE GRAPHICS QUALITY IF YOU NEED IT
